Meteara: Wait for me. Someone has come here to get me. He will not 
succeed, but we have to secure the other spheres. If things do get 
ugly, we might have to call up reinforcements.

She engages her thrusters and flies towards the rocky plateau where 
the lake where she had sent Firaxis. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: KINGER!!!!!!!  I knew you'd come around.  Oh yeah I should post 
eh?
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        He fiddles around at the sphere and plants the surveillance 
device.  
> He opens a comlink to Meteara.  "I've placed the surveillance device 
just 
> like you asked me to, now what can I do for you?"
